verbose_text: As such, IFNbeta was shown to reduce microglial mediated inflammation following spinal cord injury [XREF_BIBR] and to promote interleukin-10 production following activation of toll like receptor (TLR) -3 combined with TLR-2/4/9 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IFNbeta was shown to reduce microglial-mediated inflammation
